value: They take shelter from the downpour.\nThunder only unnerves them a little...
A lightning bolt reduces a tree to ruin!\nThe two cower away from the blast.
The lightning defeats a foe! What luck!\nTheir reward for good deeds done?
Everyone made it through unharmed!\nEven the bunny they heroically saved!
A massive cake baked to celebrate the\nseventh anniversary. It's an event item.
Used in Aether Raids to build structures that\nare available for a limited time. If that period\nhas elapsed, these stones will be lost.
Heroes cannot engage with multiple\nEmblem Heroes. Hero cannot engage.

$aOnce engaged, target Hero will gain
enhancements to their Special from
the Emblem Hero as well as stat
increases based on the Emblem
Hero's merge count.

Want to engage $a0
and $a1?

Emblem Heroes can engage with one
Hero at a time, maximum. The Hero
being engaged with can be changed
at any time.

Engage:
Emblem Heroes can engage with
other Heroes. By engaging with
another Hero, an Emblem Hero
is able to grant that other Hero
special powers.

Engage Effect - Enhance Special:
Engaged Hero's Special enhanced.
(Enhancement varies for each
Emblem Hero.)

Engage Effect - Enhance Stats:
Grants engaged unit stat increases
based on the Emblem Hero's
merge count. Every merge grants
the effect of a Dragonflower.
These increases do not impact
how stats influence opponent
selection in modes like Arena.
More Information:\nEmblem Heroes cannot engage\nwith duplicates of themselves.
